title: Reijou wa Mattari wo Goshomou - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beastkin   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Business Management   Cooking   Demi-Humans   Demons   Elves   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Mercenaries   Multiple POV   Mythical Beasts   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   Spirits   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Mitsuki Beni (BENI)   三月べに
description:
After her role as the villainess noble daughter, Rhonya started up a new cafe at the town on the edge of the country. As she wished for a laid back and relaxing life, the business from serving customers says otherwise…

One day, the renowned strongest half beasts (demi) mercenary group stumbled in the cafe.

A slow-life/layback life with the demis!>
